Description: Book of the Dead of Nesmin; frame 3; coloured vignettes.
Curator's comments: Red pigment in text is different from that in vignettes. The pink/red pigment has been identified as vermilion (see Lee and Quirke 2000, 113). Bibliography: Wüthrich, A., Édition synoptique et traduction des chapitres supplémentaires du Livre des Morts 162 à 167 (Studien zu Altägyptischen Totentexten 19,1, 2). Wiesbaden 2015. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 116. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
To be published by Inga Ulenberg.
Bibliography: Wüthrich, A., Édition synoptique et traduction des chapitres supplémentaires du Livre des Morts 162 à 167 (Studien zu Altägyptischen Totentexten 19). Wiesbaden 2015.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57210) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57210)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: discoloured Black ink Red ink Pigment Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board (warped) Binding: leather (rotten) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: C
